overview:
Timothy Lee is the Senior Vice President of Investments in Ontario at GrowthWorks Capital. Tim joined GrowthWorks in 2005 and brings over 10 years of corporate finance and venture capital experience. Prior to joining GrowthWorks, Tim was a General Partner with another Canadian venture capital firm, where he was involved with a number of notable exits.

Tim has a BA from the University of Toronto, an MBA from York University and is a Chartered Financial Analyst.

Tim currently serves a number of Boards including Sirific Wireless Corporation, Trigence Corp., Sampling Technologies Incorporated and Aizan Technologies Inc.
